name: Insert verification and analytics code
author: Sanjeev Kumar

sections.description: Insert analytics and site verification code to header in an easy way with out any coding in simple way.
sections.installation:
1. Install Insert verification and analytics code by uploading the insert-verification-and-analytics-code directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate Insert verification and analytics code through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Insert code in your header by going to the ‘Analytics Code` menu.

Thanks
Sanjeev Kumar

short_description: This plugin allows you to add insert analytics code or site verification code without edit the header file.
description: Insert analytics and site verification code to header in an easy way with out any coding in simple way.
